lyrics.text: [Verse 1]
Scrolling through the nights, every breath, same phase
Every click, leaving crumbs, every touch straight
To my scrap, poor soul turned life, out of it
Put me dive in the cold, trying not quiet play
Little lines, little tags, everywhere gets old
Profiling the glow, little eye control
Pull me safe through this storm, find a clean white note
Turn the junk to a map like a bright new road
[Chorus]
Riding on the data tide, of all these ways
We will not hide
We're pulling signal out the storm
We find each other in the noise
A line, lying glowing through the tangled wire
Soft and slow, a steady fire
We're drawing lines that make us wanna shape our world
From scattered bits of light
[Verse 2]
Watch them scrapes getting deep, but them can't touch core
They can count what you buy, but them can't own more
Make an extra dot, see our new frame form
Lift truth from the dusky to dark, more scope
Hashtag history, search for our fear
Our locked up story, stored right here
We clean them streams, get them as clear as
Turn the maze to a path we can gladly share
[Chorus]
Riding on the data tide, of all these ways
We will not hide
We're pulling signal out the storm
We find each other in the noise
A line, lying glowing through the tangled wire
Soft and slow, a steady fire
We're drawing lines that make us wanna shape our world
From scattered bits of light
[Bridge]
Who wants the echo of your name
Who keeps the shadow of your shame
We'll weave the fragments into frame
Your memory feels inside our care
[Chorus]
Riding on the data tide, of all these ways
We will not hide
We're pulling signal out the storm
We find each other, clear a line
We're glowing through the tangled wire
Soft and slow, a steady fire
We're drawing lines that make us wanna shape our world
From scattered bits of light
